aboutContent: Abba gospel is a christian platform to spread the Good News of Jesus Christ to all nations. We use the news, journals, radio, television and all kind of social medias. We focus on improving christian values and principles.
missionContent: Galatians 4: 6-7 "Now because you are his children, God has sent the spirit of his Son into our hearts to cry out "Abba Father" So you are no longera slave but a child and if you are a child, then you are also an heir because of what God did."
vissionContent: Psalms 96:3 "Declare His glory among the nations, His marvellous works among all the peoples"
footerContent: Find news, gospel, your favorite music and TV shows. Abba Gospel provides you with the latest breaking news and videos straight from the gospel industry.
